titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: John T. Conner (b. 1927) was the university pastor at Oregon State University and a member of the faculty of Oregon State University Honors School. He received his Masterâ€™s of Divinity from McCormick Theological Seminary. He served as Moderator of the 189th General Assembly of the United Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. in 1977.

scopecontent.p: This is a small collection of letters from various churches and church organizations, 1977-1978, inviting Conner to speak at or attend events and responses from Conner accepting the invitations.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
